languages.text: {n}Кибелла мягко качает головой.{/n} "Шепот смерти невозможно спутать ни с шепотом звезд, ни с шепотом скверны. Он честен. Чист. Непреклонен. Только высшие ткачи способны слышать Неумирающего и передавать волю Его. Для того они множество лет закаляют тело, и душу, и все свои чувства. Если тебе так спокойнее, можешь называть то, что мы слышим... провидением Его".

{n}Kibellah shakes her head slowly.{/n} "Death's whisper is unmistakable. It is not like the murmur of stars or the hiss of corruption. It is truthful. Pure. Unyielding. Only the most eminent of us, the high spinners, can hear the whisper of the Undying One and give voice to His will. They must hone their senses and temper their body and soul for years before His call can reach them. If it puts you more at ease, you can think of these whispers as... His providence."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла мягко качает головой.{/n} "Шепот смерти невозможно спутать ни с шепотом звезд, ни с шепотом скверны. Он честен. Чист. Непреклонен. Только высшие ткачи способны слышать Неумирающего и передавать волю Его. Для того они множество лет закаляют тело, и душу, и все свои чувства. Если тебе так спокойнее, можешь называть то, что мы слышим... провидением Его".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah slowly shakes her head.{/n} "Death's whisper is unmistakeable. It is not like the murmur of stars or the hiss of corruption. It is truthful. Pure. Unyielding. Only a high weaver can hear the Undying One's whisper and voice His will. To achieve this, they spend years upon years tempering their body and soul, honing their every sense. If it puts you at ease, you may call what we hear... His providence."

If it puts you at ease, you may call what we hear... His providence."

If it puts you more at ease, you can think of these whispers as... His providence."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah menea la cabeza despacio.{/n} «El susurro de la muerte es inconfundible. No es como el murmullo de las estrellas o el siseo de la corrupción. Es genuino. Puro. Inflexible. Solo los más eminentes de entre nosotros, los sumos tejedores, pueden oír los susurros del Inmortal y hacerse eco de Su voluntad. Han de perfeccionar sus sentidos y templar su cuerpo y alma durante años para que Su voz pueda alcanzarles. Si hace que se sienta mejor, puede pensar en esos susurros como en... Su providencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head slowly.{/n} "Death's whisper is unmistakable. It is not like the murmur of stars or the hiss of corruption. It is truthful. Pure. Unyielding. Only the most eminent of us, the high spinners, can hear the whisper of the Undying One and give voice to His will. They must hone their senses and temper their body and soul for years before His call can reach them. If it puts you more at ease, you can think of these whispers as... His providence."

Inflexible. Solo los más eminentes de entre nosotros, los sumos tejedores, pueden oír los susurros del Inmortal y hacerse eco de Su voluntad. Han de perfeccionar sus sentidos y templar su cuerpo y alma durante años para que Su voz pueda alcanzarles. Si hace que se sienta mejor, puede pensar en esos susurros como en... Su providencia».

languages.text: {n}キベラは、ゆっくりと頭を横に振る。{/n}「死の囁きは、疑いの余地がないものよ。星のざわめきや腐敗のさえずりとは違う。真実なの。純粋で。不屈。不死の者の囁きを聞いてその意思を伝えられるのは、私たちの中で最も優れた織り手だけ。主の呼び声が届くまでには、何年もかけて感覚を磨き、肉体と魂を鍛え上げる必要があるの。それで楽になれるというのなら、あの囁きを、こう考えればいい…主の摂理、と」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head slowly.{/n} "Death's whisper is unmistakable. It is not like the murmur of stars or the hiss of corruption. It is truthful. Pure. Unyielding. Only the most eminent of us, the high spinners, can hear the whisper of the Undying One and give voice to His will. They must hone their senses and temper their body and soul for years before His call can reach them. If it puts you more at ease, you can think of these whispers as... His providence."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは、ゆっくりと頭を横に振る。{/n}「死の囁きは、疑いの余地がないものよ。星のざわめきや腐敗のさえずりとは違う。真実なの。純粋で。不屈。不死の者の囁きを聞いてその意思を伝えられるのは、私たちの中で最も優れた織り手だけ。主の呼び声が届くまでには、何年もかけて感覚を磨き、肉体と魂を鍛え上げる必要があるの。それで楽になれるというのなら、あの囁きを、こう考えればいい…主の摂理、と」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈慢慢摇了摇头。{/n}“死亡的低语声是绝对不可能听错的。它既不像群星的低语，也不像腐化的嘶声。它纯洁不屈，它代表真理。只有我们之中最杰出的成员，也就是高阶织网者，才能听到不死之神的低语，道出祂的旨意。所有人都需要花上许多年时间磨砺自己的感官、躯体与灵魂，才能真正听到祂的声音。你可以把这些低语声想象成……祂的旨意，如果这么想能让你感觉放松些的话。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head slowly.{/n} "Death's whisper is unmistakable. It is not like the murmur of stars or the hiss of corruption. It is truthful. Pure. Unyielding. Only the most eminent of us, the high spinners, can hear the whisper of the Undying One and give voice to His will. They must hone their senses and temper their body and soul for years before His call can reach them. If it puts you more at ease, you can think of these whispers as... His providence."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈慢慢摇了摇头。{/n}“死亡的低语声是绝对不可能听错的。它既不像群星的低语，也不像腐化的嘶声。它纯洁不屈，它代表真理。只有我们之中最杰出的成员，也就是高阶织网者，才能听到不死之神的低语，道出祂的旨意。所有人都需要花上许多年时间磨砺自己的感官、躯体与灵魂，才能真正听到祂的声音。你可以把这些低语声想象成……祂的旨意，如果这么想能让你感觉放松些的话。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah schüttelt langsam den Kopf.{/n} "Das Flüstern des Todes ist unverkennbar. Es ist nicht wie das Murmeln der Sterne oder das Zischen der Korruption. Es ist wahrhaftig. Rein. Unnachgiebig. Nur die Angesehensten von uns, die hohen Spinner, können das Flüstern des Todlosen hören und Seinem Willen eine Stimme geben. Sie müssen ihre Sinne schulen und Körper und Seele jahrelang abhärten, bevor Sein Ruf sie erreichen kann. Wenn Euch das leichter fällt, könnt Ihr diesen Flüstern auch betrachten als ... Seine Vorsehung."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head slowly.{/n} "Death's whisper is unmistakable. It is not like the murmur of stars or the hiss of corruption. It is truthful. Pure. Unyielding. Only the most eminent of us, the high spinners, can hear the whisper of the Undying One and give voice to His will. They must hone their senses and temper their body and soul for years before His call can reach them. If it puts you more at ease, you can think of these whispers as... His providence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah schüttelt langsam den Kopf.{/n} "Das Flüstern des Todes ist unverkennbar. Es ist nicht wie das Murmeln der Sterne oder das Zischen der Korruption. Es ist wahrhaftig. Rein. Unnachgiebig. Nur die Angesehensten von uns, die hohen Spinner, können das Flüstern des Todlosen hören und Seinem Willen eine Stimme geben. Sie müssen ihre Sinne schulen und Körper und Seele jahrelang abhärten, bevor Sein Ruf sie erreichen kann. Wenn Euch das leichter fällt, könnt Ihr diesen Flüstern auch betrachten als ... Seine Vorsehung."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah secoue lentement la tête.{/n} « Les murmures de la mort sont reconnaissables entre tous. Ils n'ont rien à avoir avec le souffle des étoiles ou le sifflement de la corruption. Ils sont authentiques. Purs. Implacables. Seuls les plus éminents d'entre nous, les hauts tisseurs, peuvent entendre la voix de l'Immortel et se faire les porte-parole de Sa volonté. Pour que Son appel leur parvienne, ils doivent affûter leurs sens et galvaniser leur corps et leur âme des années durant. Si cela peut vous rassurer, libre à vous de considérer ces murmures comme... Sa divine providence. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head slowly.{/n} "Death's whisper is unmistakable. It is not like the murmur of stars or the hiss of corruption. It is truthful. Pure. Unyielding. Only the most eminent of us, the high spinners, can hear the whisper of the Undying One and give voice to His will. They must hone their senses and temper their body and soul for years before His call can reach them. If it puts you more at ease, you can think of these whispers as... His providence."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, yavaşça başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Ölümün fısıltısı kendine hastır. Ne yıldızların mırıltısına benzer ne de yozlaşmanın tıslamasına. Hakikati söyler. Saftır. Boyun eğmez. Aramızdan sadece en seçkinler, yani yüksek dokurlar; Ölmeyen'in fısıltısını işitip O'nun iradesini dile getirebilir. O'nun çağrısının bize ulaşabilmesi için yıllarca sezgilerimizi güçlendirip vücudumuzu ve ruhumuzu eğitmemiz gerekir. İçin rahatlayacaksa bu fısıltılara takdiriilahi gözüyle bakabilirsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head slowly.{/n} "Death's whisper is unmistakable. It is not like the murmur of stars or the hiss of corruption. It is truthful. Pure. Unyielding. Only the most eminent of us, the high spinners, can hear the whisper of the Undying One and give voice to His will. They must hone their senses and temper their body and soul for years before His call can reach them. If it puts you more at ease, you can think of these whispers as... His providence."
